message.entry: Promoting Job
Unable to remove job {0} on scheduler {1}
Cannot determine MJS Security Level for scheduler {0}.
No scheduler given. Either use the -scheduler argument or configure the scheduler in the Polyspace UI preferences.
Check the scheduler argument is a valid hostname or a valid MATLAB cluster profile name.
Imported profile: {0}.

NAME
 polyspace-cluster-profile-manager
 
 SYNOPSIS
 polyspace-cluster-profile-manager -import-profile <CLUSTER_PROFILE>
 
 DESCRIPTION
 Use polyspace-cluster-profile-manager to import a cluster profile.
 
 <CLUSTER_PROFILE> is the path to a file containing profile data exported from the
 MATLAB Cluster Profile Manager.
